item.title: Words of Wisdom from Modern Family
item.description: “Always look people in the eye. Even if they’re blind. Just say ‘I’m looking you in the eye’” “If you get pulled over for speeding. Tell them your spouse has diarrhoea.” “The most amazing things that can happen to a human being will happen to you, if you just lower your expectations.” “You only get one chance at a first impression. I suggest Julia Child because it’s easy to do.

item.title: Rescue time with RescueTime
item.description: RescueTime helps you understand where your time goes each day. Optimize your energy. And take back control of your day.
